sections.title: You can not register the business for this service

fields.infoText:
This is because the business must have a Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR) to register for this service.

The business will automatically be sent a Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR) when it:

* registers for Self Assessment

* sets up as a limited company

Information about [finding a lost UTR](https://www.gov.uk/find-lost-utr-number) can be found on GOV.UK

You'll need to exit this service.

sections.title: Enter the details for the business you want to register

fields.label: Postcode of main place of business
fields.helpText: This should match the postcode HMRC holds for the business's Corporation Tax or Self Assessment details.

fields.label: Unique Taxpayer Reference
fields.helpText: This is 10 numbers, for example 12345 67890. It will be on tax returns and other letters from HMRC. It may be called ‘reference’, ‘UTR’ or ‘official use’.

sections.title: Is this the business you want to register?

fields.label: Is this the business you want to register?

sections.title: You'll need to enter different details or exit this service

fields.infoText:
You'll need to do one of the following:

* check your records and enter the correct Unique Tax Payer Reference and postcode of the business you do want to register

* exit this service
